>
[Rod of Negation](/Equipment.aspx?ID=264)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 574 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 4,300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This long, plain, leaden rod can disrupt magic.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact;     **Effect** This rod emits a thin, gray beam that negates a spell or magic item, casting a 6th-level [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) spell with a counteract modifier of +23. Once activated, the rod can’t be activated again for 2d6 hours.
